comments: arctan(cos(x)*tan(x))=x-3/3!*x^3+45/5!*x^5-1743/7!*x^7+125625/9!*x^9...Absolute values are coefficients in expansion of atanh(asinh(x)).arctanh(sinh(x)) = x + 3*x^3/3! + 45*x^5/5! + 1743*x^7/7! +...arccot(sin(x)) = Pi/2 - x + 3*x^3/3! - 45*x^5/5! + 1743*x^7/7! -...
mathematica: Drop[ Range[0, 25]! CoefficientList[ Series[ ArcTan[ Sin[x]], {x, 0, 25}], x], {1, 25, 2}] (* Or *)f[n_] := n!Sum[(1 + (-1)^(n - 2k + 1))2^(1 - 2k)Sum[(-1)^((n + 1)/2 - j)Binomial[2k - 1, j]((2j - 2k + 1)^n/n!)/(2k - 1), {j, 0, (2k - 1)/2}], {k, Ceiling[n/2]}]; Table[ f[n], {n, 1, 25, 2}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
